name: Corridor (AllanTimX)
description:
This Is my second Horror Game in Itch.io.This Game inspired by Punity and Anatomy.This Game has a supranatural and psychological horror

Story

The character is  trapped in the mysterious corridor.Some Mysterious event will happen when the character is long time in the corridor

Control

W,A,S,D or -Up,Down,Left,Right Arrow to Move
